name: Wong Sun v. United States
first_party: Wong Sun and James Wah Toy

lower_court.name: United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit

advocates.advocate_description: acting under appointment by the Court, for the petitioners
Solicitor General, Department of Justice, for the United States
reargued the cause for the United States

decisions.description: Prejudicial error at trial may have considered each petitioner's statement as corroboration of the other petitioner's guilt
